SELECT COUNT(T.id) FROM TRADE T
INNER JOIN USER_PLACE P ON P.id = #{placeId}
WHERE T.gacha_id = #{gachaId} AND T.status != 'DELETED'
AND T.hope_method = 'DIRECT' AND T.hope_location_latitude BETWEEN P.latitude - 0.045 AND P.latitude + 0.045 AND T.hope_location_longitude BETWEEN P.longitude - 0.06 AND P.longitude + 0.06 AND ( 6371 * acos( cos(radians(P.latitude)) * cos(radians(T.hope_location_latitude)) * cos(radians(T.hope_location_longitude) - radians(P.longitude)) + sin(radians(P.latitude)) * sin(radians(T.hope_location_latitude)) ) ) <= 5
AND T.status = 'PENDING'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TRADE_ITEM TI WHERE TI.trade_id = T.id AND TI.status != 'DELETED' AND ( (T.type = 'SALES' AND TI.sales_item_id = #{gachaItemId}) OR (T.type = 'EXCHANGE' AND TI.exchange_give_item_id = #{gachaItemId}) ) )

SELECT T.id AS trade_id , T.gacha_id , T.user_id , U.nickname AS user_nickname , T.type , T.status , T.title , T.content , T.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = T.file_id ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 1) AS file_url , T.hope_method , IFNULL(T.hope_location, T.hope_address) AS hope_direct_trade_location , ( SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = T.id AND status NOT IN ('DELETED') ) AS suggest_count , T.created_at FROM TRADE T INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = T.user_id
INNER JOIN USER_PLACE P ON P.id = #{placeId}
WHERE T.gacha_id = #{gachaId} AND T.status != 'DELETED'
AND T.hope_method = 'DIRECT' AND T.hope_location_latitude BETWEEN P.latitude - 0.045 AND P.latitude + 0.045 AND T.hope_location_longitude BETWEEN P.longitude - 0.06 AND P.longitude + 0.06 AND ( 6371 * acos( cos(radians(P.latitude)) * cos(radians(T.hope_location_latitude)) * cos(radians(T.hope_location_longitude) - radians(P.longitude)) + sin(radians(P.latitude)) * sin(radians(T.hope_location_latitude)) ) ) <= 5
AND T.status = 'PENDING'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TRADE_ITEM TI WHERE TI.trade_id = T.id AND TI.status != 'DELETED' AND ( (T.type = 'SALES' AND TI.sales_item_id = #{gachaItemId}) OR (T.type = 'EXCHANGE' AND TI.exchange_give_item_id = #{gachaItemId}) ) )
ORDER BY T.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT TI.id AS trade_item_id , TI.trade_id , TI.gacha_id , TI.type , TI.status , TI.created_at , TI.updated_at , TI.sales_item_id , GI_S.name AS sales_item_name , TI.sales_price , TI.exchange_give_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_give_item_name , TI.exchange_want_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_want_item_name FROM TRADE_ITEM TI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_S ON GI_S.id = TI.sales_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TI.exchange_give_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TI.exchange_want_item_id WHERE TI.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND TI.status != 'DELETED' ORDER BY TI.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type}

SELECT T.id AS trade_id , T.gacha_id , T.user_id , '' AS user_nickname , T.type , T.status , T.title , T.content , T.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = T.file_id ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 1) AS file_url , T.hope_method , IFNULL(T.hope_location, T.hope_address) AS hope_direct_trade_location , ( SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = T.id AND status NOT IN ('DELETED') ) AS suggest_count , T.created_at FROM TRADE T WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type} AND status != 'DELETED' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
